## AnalyticsProvider

interface AnalyticsProvider {
    readonly name: string;
    track(engine: AnalyticsEngine, event: AnalyticsEvent): Promise<void>;
    identify?(engine: AnalyticsEngine, event: IdentifyEvent): Promise<void>;
}
